pullRequest.title: [IOTDB-624]Fix a Last cache bug when WAL is disabled
pullRequest.bodyText:
When WAL is disabled,  inserting batch data with IoTDB session interfaces and update Last Query cache may crash.
JIRA issue:https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IOTDB-624

commit.message: Fix a Last cache bug when WAL is disabled

nodes.bodyText: Reset to true in the end
Do not use testInsertRecord, use insertRecord
do not use testInsertTablet, use insertTablet

this table does not have any data, it will not be sent to the server.
Look the SessionExample to see the use of Tablet

commit.message: use insertRecord and insertTablet in test cases
